page.title: 08Ghosts in Bromsgrove (2)
page.content: Mr.Leak screamed and he is now deaf in his right ear. His wife used to live in the Chateaux Impney,she died there.She now haunts the Chateaux Impney.Many people around and in Stoke Prior have seen John Corbett's ghost.I collected this information from Trudy Peplow who has seen John Corbett's ghost. {The Black Cross} The ghost of the Black Cross was supposed to be an old man who drank at the pub.Sometimes he goes to the Black Cross to haunt,he goes down tothe cellar and knocks down the bottles.Then he appears and slams the till,he pours pints of bear but you
